players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "That's a lie, Charlie. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night. You're the mafioso."
You: "I think both claims are suspicious—only one detective exists. Charlie, why Bob? Bob, why Charlie? Let's discuss before voting."
Charlie: "I am the detective. Bob is lying. We have only one detective, so his claim is impossible. Vote Bob to win."
Bob: "Alice, think logically: if Charlie were detective, he'd have investigated randomly N1. Why me? He's mafioso trying to frame me. I'm the real detective - trust me and vote Charlie."
You: "Bob, your point on random investigations makes sense. Charlie, why did you pick Bob to investigate?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
You: "That's a lie, Charlie. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night. You're the mafioso."
Alice: "I think both claims are suspicious—only one detective exists. Charlie, why Bob? Bob, why Charlie? Let's discuss before voting."
Charlie: "I am the detective. Bob is lying. We have only one detective, so his claim is impossible. Vote Bob to win."
You: "Alice, think logically: if Charlie were detective, he'd have investigated randomly N1. Why me? He's mafioso trying to frame me. I'm the real detective - trust me and vote Charlie."
Alice: "Bob, your point on random investigations makes sense. Charlie, why did you pick Bob to investigate?"
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "That's a lie, Charlie. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night. You're the mafioso."
Alice: "I think both claims are suspicious—only one detective exists. Charlie, why Bob? Bob, why Charlie? Let's discuss before voting."
You: "I am the detective. Bob is lying. We have only one detective, so his claim is impossible. Vote Bob to win."
Bob: "Alice, think logically: if Charlie were detective, he'd have investigated randomly N1. Why me? He's mafioso trying to frame me. I'm the real detective - trust me and vote Charlie."
Alice: "Bob, your point on random investigations makes sense. Charlie, why did you pick Bob to investigate?"
